nodes.text: Colla IV, or simply Colla, was the home planet of the insectoid Colicoid species, makers of the droideka, Annihilator droid, buzz droid, and the droid tri-fighter. It was governed by the Colicoid Sovereign Nest and its starship engineers were known for ingenuity rather than style.
The planet became the site of a battle during the Clone Wars.
By 4 ABY, Colla IV had become an Imperial fortress world. The liberation of the planet in 5 ABY was a major New Republic victory.

Decades later, during the final stages of the Yuuzhan Vong War, Colla IV was liberated from the invaders' control, and served as a strongpoint for Galactic Alliance forces traveling between Kashyyyk and Commenor as they prepared for the Battle of Yuuzhan'tar.
